mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, remark, special_client_id, create_time,client_id from sys_menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select table_name, table_comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables
and table_name NOT LIKE 'gen_%' and table_name NOT LIKE 'ACT_%' and table_name NOT LIKE 'QRTZ_%' and table_name NOT LIKE 'FLW_%' and table_name NOT LIKE 'sys_%' and table_comment != '' and table_schema = (select database())
and table_name like concat('%', #{tableName} ,'%')
and table_comment like concat('%', #{tableComment} ,'%')
mapper.sql: select t.menu_id, t.menu_name as button, t.menu_type, t.status as button_status, t3.client_id, t3.role_name, t3.role_key, t3.status as role_status, t3.role_type, t3.role_id, t4.menu_name as menu_name, t4.status as menu_status, CONCAT_WS('-',t5.menu_name,t6.menu_name) as catalogue from sys_menu t left join sys_role_menu t2 on t2.menu_id=t.menu_id left join sys_role t3 on t3.role_id=t2.role_id left join sys_menu t4 on t4.menu_id=t.parent_id left join sys_menu t5 on t5.menu_id=t4.parent_id left join sys_menu t6 on t6.menu_id=t5.parent_id

select.where:
t3.role_name is not null and t.menu_type='F'
AND t3.role_name in (#{item})
AND t3.role_type in (#{item})
AND t.menu_name in (#{item})
AND t4.status in (#{item})
AND t3.status like concat('%', #{roleStatus}, '%')

AND t3.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%')

mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '0' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '0' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}

mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, path, component, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, remark, special_client_id, client_id, create_by, create_time )values( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{isFrame}, #{isCache}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{specialClientId}, #{clientId}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.STATUS, ifnull( m.perms, '' ) AS perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time, t4.menu_name AS menu_name_1, t5.menu_name AS menu_name_2, t6.menu_name AS menu_name_3, CONCAT_WS( '-', t5.menu_name, t6.menu_name ) AS catalogue FROM sys_user t LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON t.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role t2 ON t2.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON t3.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu t4 ON t4.menu_id = m.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu t5 ON t5.menu_id = t4.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu t6 ON t6.menu_id = t5.parent_id WHERE t.user_id = #{user_id} AND ( t6.menu_name = '移动端' OR t5.menu_name = '移动端' OR t4.menu_name = '移动端' OR m.menu_name = '移动端' )
